informacion.title: About Me
informacion.description:
Hello! I am passionate about programming and technology. I love putting myself to the test every day with the challenges that I find. It motivates me a lot to know that this world of technology is so immense, especially being able to learn something new every day that contributes to my evolution. In my free time I like to play Chess♟️, being able to face different players from all over the world online, at the same time that it stimulates my capacity for analysis and imagination. I like to go to the gym🏋🏿 to exercise and relax a bit and finally play soccer❤️⚽. This helps me to disconnect from my daily activities, relax and dedicate time to myself.
My motto is to always be POSITIVE regardless of the adversities that life throws your way💪🏿🙌🏿.

I am a proactive person, excellent teammate, organized and responsible. I really enjoy learning new things, so my goal is a challenging and dynamic position where I can gain new knowledge, develop my skills and gain work experience.

project.title: Projects
project.project1: An electronic store, about sports products from the Qatar 2022 World Cup. Where the customer is offered clothing and balls that they can buy in our store.
project.project2: Dog application using React, Redux, pure CSS for the frontend and Backend developed in Node.js with Express. Database in PostgreSQL and Sequelize. Among the features you can search for a dog, filtering, ordering and creating a new dog.
project.project3: A task application developed in React, where you can add, complete, delete and filter a task, having data persistence by the localStorage implementation.
